description: This file defines a React component for the application's main landing page, including UI elements like headers, quick action links, and a chat input area with recent references. It primarily handles rendering and user interactions on the front end.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the landing page with action cards and chat playground.

methods.name: ActionCard
methods.description: Reusable component for displaying quick action options with a link and description.
